item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

durial12:

If we help you get rid of an anti-leech then that kind of defeats the objective of it. The point is that is stops people downloading the server and hosting it as their own.

no… the point is to stop people downloading it, changing a few sendMessages and the name of the server and hosting it.

item.title: How can I remove anti-leech
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Basically I got a server and it has anti-leech in the client above quests, but I don’t know how to remove it.

heres the code with the text in it, when i compile the old text is still in the quest:

public class textHandler {
public void startText(int ID) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
c.sendQuest(“Kills: " + c.rating, 3985);
c.sendQuest(“RevolutionX Highscore’s”, 6399);
c.sendQuest(“RevolutionX”, 640); <- thats whats i want to change
c.sendQuest(“Quests”, 663);
if(c.q1 == 0){
c.sendQuest(“Lost City”, 7332);
}
if(c.q1 > 0){
c.sendQuest(”@yel@Lost City", 7332);
}
if(c.q1 == 15){
c.sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332);
}
if(c.q2 == 0){
c.sendQuest(“Rune Mysteries”, 7333);
}
if(c.q2 > 0){
c.sendQuest("@yel@Rune Mysteries", 7333);
}
if(c.q2 == 15){
c.sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333);
}

I’m not sure how to remove anti-leech if someone could help that would be sensational.
Regards,
James

Read full topic
